content: I understand how you feel. the massive amount of information and opinions being shared on social media can be overwhelming and difficult to digest. it's important to remember that social media is just one source of information, and it's important to take a critical approach to the information we consume. it's also important to set boundaries and take breaks from social media when it feels too overwhelming. instead of constantly scrolling through our feeds, we can try to engage with others through direct messages or in-person conversations, which can be more meaningful and authentic. we can also cultivate a curated social media experience by following accounts that are positive and informative, and unfollowing or muting those that are not.
